page.title: 13East Woodhay Silver Band
page.content: East Woodhay Silver Band is a hundred and one years old. It had its centenery a short time ago. Mr Webb is the bandmaster. In the senior band there are twenty-eight musicians,in the youth band there are twenty-six musicians,in the original band there were about ten to fifteen musicians.Mr Webb has been a conducter for thirty-eight years and his wife has been playing for thirty-three years. He has sixty-six instruments in the band. He has more cornets than any other instrument. He has thirty to thirty five competitions and venues to go to every year. His favourite award winning concert was Shaw Social Club Band Contest. He thinks East Woodhay Silver Band is very much a part of village life and hopes it will continue for many years.
